short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Art masterpieces in your browser tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Picasso replaces Chrome's default New Tab page with a wide selection of art masterpieces and shows you a new painting every day.

Click on the background to get information about the artwork or to skip to the next one. The images are provided by Wikiart.
